title: Delicious Vegan Date Fudge Balls
directions: Mash dates together in a bowl until a paste-like consistency. Add peanut butter; mix well. Stir almonds, coconut, cocoa powder, and salt into date mixture. Roll date mixture into balls.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons chopped almonds, or to taste (optional)
2 tablespoons shredded unsweetened coconut, or to taste (optional)
